segments.text: Hi , John ! How was your vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We went to Malaysia and Thailand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That must have been wonderful . Do anything interesting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . We went bungee jumping when we were in Malaysia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A little , but the rush was worth it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We jumped off a bridge and fell 500 feet before the bungee cord caught us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 500 feet ! I would never be able to do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , It was scary but exhilarating .
segments.speaker: S2
